attributes.action: Parliament mandates playing the Ukrainian anthem before all major sports events.
attributes.additional_details:
Because the peace which has been enjoyed between European neighbours since 1945, is facing an existential threat like never before. 
Therefore we must show solidarity with the Ukrainian people at this terrible moment in their national history.
attributes.background: Pass any requisite regulation or statutory instrument.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for individual sports clubs and events organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428 

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431
